channel.title: No-Ip... Help greatly Appreciated!
channel.description:
Ok so....
I have No-Ip Working and all.
But it only works for people who are on Hamachi.
Question:
How do I make it so people who don't have Hamachi can also connect to my server by using the No-Ip?
